name: shutrlink
description: A URL shortener with image preview functionality

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:shared"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=server
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=client && npm run clean --workspace=server && npm run clean --workspace=shared
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=client && npm run type-check --workspace=server && npm run type-check --workspace=shared
